name: Splux - 4 Way Tetris!
description:
In the near future... The Earth is devastated and became a no men's land. Humankind explored the outer space in search of a New Earth, only to find a SQUARE EARTH! Become a space commander and control a fleet of blocks to save the species and compete over other civilizations. The only thing standing between extinction and your people... is YOU!

Stack and Conquer with SPLUX!!
--------
Splux is breaking a stereotype about the gravity that everything falls downwards. By reinterpreting a classic block puzzle game, Splux lets players to compete around the square-shaped platform of the Earth by controlling their blocks and stacking them onto the Earth.

_____
- Easy controls
- Dynamic multiplayer experience
- 3 different single play modes
- AI battle mode!

_____

Controls

Right, Left, Down Arrows - Move Block
Up Arrow - Rotate Block
Left Ctrl - Hold Block
Space - Drop Block
Shift - Activate/Deactivate Bomb
C - Reaction
